PersonalizableAttribute Class

In this Article

Represents the personalization attribute. This class cannot be inherited.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Property)]
public sealed class PersonalizableAttribute : Attribute

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Attribute
  • PersonalizableAttribute

Remarks

The personalization attribute, Personalizable, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information. ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page.

The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable:

  • The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors.

  • The property must be a read/write property.

  • The property must be without parameters.

  • The property cannot be indexed.

    Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties. Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above.

    Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization. Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an HttpException being thrown. Parameterized properties also throw an HttpException exception.

    Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the IPersonalizable interface is used.

    For more information about using attributes, see Web Parts Personalization Overview.

Constructors summary

PersonalizableAttribute()

Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class.
PersonalizableAttribute(Boolean)

Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameter.
PersonalizableAttribute(PersonalizationScope)

Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameter.
PersonalizableAttribute(PersonalizationScope,Boolean)

Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameters.

Fields summary

Default

Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.
NotPersonalizable

Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.
Personalizable

Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization. This field is read-only.
SharedPersonalizable

Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope. This field is read-only.
UserPersonalizable

Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in PersonalizationScope scope. This field is read-only.

Properties summary

IsPersonalizable

Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.
IsSensitive

Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.
Scope

Gets the PersonalizationScope enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.

Methods summary

Equals(Object)

When overridden, returns a Boolean evaluation of the current instance of PersonalizableAttribute and another PersonalizableAttribute instance supplied as a parameter.
GetHashCode()

When overridden, returns a hash code of the attribute.
GetPersonalizableProperties(Type)

Returns a collection of PropertyInfo objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
IsDefaultAttribute()

When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static Default field.
Match(Object)

Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of PersonalizableAttribute and the specified PersonalizableAttribute have the same stem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable* property value.

Constructors

  • PersonalizableAttribute()

    Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class.

    public PersonalizableAttribute ();

    Remarks

    This constructor internally sets the IsPersonalizable property to true, the Scope property to PersonalizationScope, and the IsSensitive property to false.

  • PersonalizableAttribute(Boolean)

    Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameter.

    public PersonalizableAttribute (bool isPersonalizable);

    Parameters

    • isPersonalizable
      Boolean

      A Boolean value indicating whether the property can be personalized.

    Remarks

    This constructor internally sets the IsPersonalizable property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the Scope property to PersonalizationScope, and the IsSensitive property to false.

    This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.

  • PersonalizableAttribute(PersonalizationScope)

    Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameter.

    public PersonalizableAttribute (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope);

    Parameters

    • scope
      PersonalizationScope

      A PersonalizationScope indicating the scope of the personalization.

    Remarks

    This constructor internally sets the IsPersonalizable property to true, the Scope property to the parameter specified, and the IsSensitive property to false.

  • PersonalizableAttribute(PersonalizationScope,Boolean)

    Initializes a new instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class using the provided parameters.

    public PersonalizableAttribute (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope, bool isSensitive);

    Parameters

    • scope
      PersonalizationScope

      A PersonalizationScope indicating the scope of the personalization.

    • isSensitive
      Boolean

      A Boolean value indicating whether the property information is considered sensitive.

    Remarks

    This constructor internally sets the IsPersonalizable property to true, the Scope property to the first parameter specified, and the IsSensitive property to the second parameter specified.

Fields

  • Default

    Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

    public static readonly System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute Default;

    Remarks

    This field is used in conjunction with the IsDefaultAttribute method.

    This field and the NotPersonalizable field have the same value.

  • NotPersonalizable

    Returns an attribute instance that indicates no support for personalization. This field is read-only.

    public static readonly System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute NotPersonalizable;

    Remarks

    This field and the PersonalizableAttribute field have the same value.

  • Personalizable

    Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization. This field is read-only.

    public static readonly System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute Personalizable;

    Remarks

    This attribute instance has its Scope property set to PersonalizationScope and its IsSensitive property set to false.

  • SharedPersonalizable

    Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization with a shared scope. This field is read-only.

    public static readonly System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute SharedPersonalizable;

    Remarks

    This attribute instance has its Scope property set to PersonalizationScope and its IsSensitive property set to false.

  • UserPersonalizable

    Returns an attribute instance that indicates support for personalization in PersonalizationScope scope. This field is read-only.

    public static readonly System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute UserPersonalizable;

    Remarks

    This attribute instance has its Scope property set to PersonalizationScope and its IsSensitive property set to false.

Properties

  • IsPersonalizable

    Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute can be personalized, as established by one of the constructors.

    public bool IsPersonalizable { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property can be personalized; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This value is set when an instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class is created.

  • IsSensitive

    Gets the setting that indicates whether the attribute is sensitive, as established by one of the constructors.

    public bool IsSensitive { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is sensitive; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This value is set when an instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class is created.

    This property controls how the property value is exported. If the property is set to true, it will not be exported when the control's ExportMode property is set to WebPartExportMode.

  • Scope

    Gets the PersonalizationScope enumeration value for the class instance, as set by one of the constructors.

    public System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope Scope { get; }

    Property Value

    • PersonalizationScope

      A PersonalizationScope enumeration value.

    Remarks

    This value is set when an instance of the PersonalizableAttribute class is created.

    This property controls when the property value is saved and loaded, depending on the Scope property of the page.

Methods

  • Equals(Object)

    When overridden, returns a Boolean evaluation of the current instance of PersonalizableAttribute and another PersonalizableAttribute instance supplied as a parameter.

    public override bool Equals (object obj);

    Parameters

    • obj
      Object

      The PersonalizableAttribute to be compared to the current instance.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the values are equal; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Two PersonalizableAttribute instances are considered equal if their IsPersonalizable, Scope, and IsSensitive property settings are the same.

  • GetHashCode()

    When overridden, returns a hash code of the attribute.

    public override int GetHashCode ();

    Returns

    • Int32

      A hash code in the form of an integer.

    Remarks

    The hash code is based on an attribute's IsPersonalizable, Scope, and IsSensitive property settings.

  • GetPersonalizableProperties(Type)

    Returns a collection of PropertyInfo objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.

    public static System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties (Type type);

    Parameters

    • type
      Type

      The type on which to look for Personalizable properties.

    Returns

    • ICollection

      An ICollection of personalizable properties.

    Exceptions

    • HttpException

      A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.

    Remarks

    This method returns a collection containing zero or more PropertyInfo objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where IsPersonalizable equals true.

    The type parameter is the type on which to look for Personalizable properties. For example, you would pass in "typeof(MyWebPart)" to get the Personalizable properties on the MyWebPart class.

  • IsDefaultAttribute()

    When overridden, returns a value that indicates whether the attribute instance equals the value of the static Default field.

    public override bool IsDefaultAttribute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the attribute instance equals the static Default field; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    The Default field indicates no support for personalization.

  • Match(Object)

    Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance of PersonalizableAttribute and the specified PersonalizableAttribute have the same stem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable* property value.

    public override bool Match (object obj);

    Parameters

    • obj
      Object

      The PersonalizableAttribute to be compared to the current instance.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the two attributes have the same stem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute.IsPersonalizable* value; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Use this method to match properties that have the same IsPersonalizable value.
